overview: Right in the middle of a very busy city, there is a peaceful place. It’s a cosy park, closed off and forgotten, a true oasis. This is where you will find Ollie, the little blue owl and his friends – a small stork, a young frog and five little birds. Together they all have lots of adventures. If you want to meet them, you are very welcome there – if you can find it.
title: Ollie
